messages.welcome: Welcome back, sign in with your existing account.

errors.facebookNoEmail: Your Facebook account doesn't have an email address. Please use a different login method or add an email to your Facebook account.
errors.auth0NoEmail: Your Auth0 account doesn't have an email address. Please use a different login method or add an email to your Auth0 account.
errors.googleNoEmail: Your Google account doesn't have an email address. Please use a different login method or add an email to your Google account.
